alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tuscaloosa, northeastern Pickens and Fayette Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bluff to Millport. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fayette, Berry, Belk, Ashcraft Corner, Bankston, Bluff, Stone Wall, Moores Bridge, Wayside, Richard Arthur Field, Fayette County Public Lake, Bevill State College Fayette, Hubbertville and Fowlers Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
